item.description: What are you waiting for, a personal invite. This is an open meetup to anyone and everyone that would like to join us for great fun, food and drink. Karaoke has never been this good. Great place in the Somerville area for Karaoke, we got a stage, lighting, professional sound system, The Rosebud has great atmosphere, the best singers and the menu has a lot of great choices, prom pizza, buffalo wings, taco salads and more. So don't miss out on what The Rosebud has to offer. We hope to hear from you
item.name: Sunday Night Karaoke @ The Rosebud Bar & Grill
